thread.title: Conway Under Fire For Promoting Ivanka Trump’s Brand
thread.title_full: Conway Under Fire For Promoting Ivanka Trump’s Brand

author: Alicia Powe
title: Conway Under Fire For Promoting Ivanka Trump’s Brand

organizations.name: conway under fire for promoting ivanka trump

text:
Pelosi, Waters Use ‘Alternative Facts’ In Their Cases Against Trump 
“This appears to be a textbook violation of government ethics laws and regulations enacted to prevent the abuse of an employee’s government position,” Cummings said. 
Chaffetz and Cummings reportedly are “jointly going to send a letter to the White House and Office of Government Ethics for a referral” on disciplinary actions for Conway. 
The watchdog group Citizens for Responsibility and Ethics in Washington also filed a complaint against Conway with the Office of Government Ethics. 
“The law is clear that public officials should not use their offices for their own private gain or the private gain of others,” Noah Bookbinder, CREW’s executive director said in a statement. “It’s hard to find a clearer case of that kind of misuse of office than we saw today.” 
White House press secretary Sean Spicer said Thursday that Conway has been spoken to about the incident. 
“Kellyanne has been counseled, and that’s all we are going to go with,” Spicer told reporters during his daily briefing. “She’s been counseled on the subject, and that’s it.” What do you think? Scroll down to comment below. Advertisement Popular Right Now
